pr_title: Optimize DistinctCount to store dictIds within segment

timeline.bodyText: probably not relevant to this PR but we should try to move towards using Block instead of DataSource
timeline.author: kishoreg

timeline.bodyText: how come we never needed this? For group by, we already have the optimization to work on dictionary ids right?
timeline.author: kishoreg

replies.bodyText: For group-by, the dictionary is fetched from the TransformFunction
replies.author: Jackie-Jiang
